title: Locally Anisotropic Interactions: II. Torsions and Curvatures of Higher Order Anisotropic Superspaces
abstract: Torsions, curvatures, structure equations and Bianchi identities for locally anisotropic superspaces (containing as particular cases different supersymmetric extensions and prolongations of Riemann, Finsler, Lagrange and Kaluza--Klein spaces) are investigated.
